attributes.action: formalise the treatment of members expenses by Act of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Act of Parliament would require members expenses to be subject to the higher rate tax deduction at source. At the close of the tax year, the onus would then rest on the members of the Commons and Lords to submit claims to HM Revenue & Customs, to seek repayment of tax suffered on expenses which were wholly, exclusively and necessarily incurred in the course of their employment as members.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
